snippet: Chris Teare, the director of college counseling at Antilles School in St. Thomas, V.I., advises rising seniors to complete their summer reading and start their college applications.
abstract: Chris Teare, the director of college counseling at Antilles School in St. Thomas, V.I., advises rising seniors to complete their summer reading and start their college applications.

headline.main: Counselor's Calendar | August Checklist for Rising Seniors
